Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage and 
stuns the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description:
50% chance of Super Attack transforming 
and ATK being greatly raised for 1 turn! 
Power will increase more if Super Attack level reaches 20!

5521.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description:
50% chance of Super Attack transforming 
and DEF being greatly raised for the rest of battle! 
Power will increase more if Super Attack level reaches 20!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!
